myBlogTable.db_getQuery: SELECT ub.id, ub.image_1 AS image1, ub.image_2 AS image2,ub.image_3 AS image3,ub.title,ub.post_timestamp AS date,uin.user_name AS userName,ub.content AS text FROM user_blog AS ub,user_inf AS uin WHERE ub.user_key='user_key' AND ub.user_key=uin.id ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
